forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms. Some of the storms could be severe. Mostly sunny. High near 92, with temperatures falling to around 90 in the afternoon. Southwest wind around 13 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Mostly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 10pm. Some of the storms could be severe. Mostly cloudy. Low around 67, with temperatures rising to around 70 overnight. West southwest wind 6 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 84. West northwest wind 7 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 64. Northwest wind 2 to 8 mph.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
